parameters.name: WhichOne
parameters.description: 0-based index indicating the datum reference label to set

title: IDatumTargetSym.SetDatumReferenceLabel
description: Sets the specified datum target reference label.
signature:
System.Boolean SetDatumReferenceLabel( 
   System.Int32
WhichOne
,
   System.String
Text
)

parameters.name: WhichOne
parameters.description: 0-based index indicating the datum reference label to set

returns: True if the datum reference label is set successfully, false if it was not
remarks:
Use
IDatumTargetSym::GetDatumReferenceLabel
to get the datum target reference labels.
To see the change in a drawing, call
IModelDoc2::GraphicsRedraw2
.
